TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpUrlEncodedBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension
Public NotInheritable Class HttpUrlEncodedBinding Inherits ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

Docs.summary: Represents an extensibility element added to an within an XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class specifies that the incoming data will be in the format"name=value&name=value", encoded from an HTML form, regardless of whether the value of the `Method` attribute of the form is `POST` or `GET`.
Note that this encoding is derived from a feature of HTML and is not specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm> class, although the `HtmlForm` class does support it. For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [XML Web Services Using ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ba0z6a33(v=vs.100)). For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) specification.
